Talk_0041:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkDeny>Now, where is my sweetheart? I thought
this is where we agreed to meet...
Talk_0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Eh? <sp:5:0:0>Oh, this won't do!<sp:5:0:0>


K... <sp:5:0:0>Ki... <sp:5:0:0>Kil...<sp:5:0:0> Kil-what's-his-name bought
this place.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal>Now that I think about it, wasn't there a
monster here? Maybe someone drove
it away.
Talk_0042:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I just remembered that I'm supposed to
meet my wife.

<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Eh?<sp:5:0:0> Oh, this won't do...


I need to hurry if I'm going to be on time.
Talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal>Eh? <sp:5:1:0>I don't remember arranging a visit.


But it's late and I'm going to sleep.
Could you come again tomorrow?
Talk_0044: <sp:3:0:2:0a00>Ooh, I feel rainy days right in the knees.
Talk_0009: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Eh?<sp:5:0:0> The inn?<sp:5:0:0> Oh, this isn't right!
Talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal>Eh? <sp:5:1:0>Who are you?<sp:5:0:0> Are you lost?


I've also been getting more forgetful
lately, so I understand.
Talk_0095:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>Need to take shelter... This cold is no
good for these old bones!
Talk_0035: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Oh! Well, well. It's been a while.
Talk_0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>My memory isn't what it used to be, but of
course I remember you.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Yes, we met just over there. Or, ah,
maybe it was over there...
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Eh? <sp:5:0:0>Ah, that's right!<sp:5:0:0>


K... <sp:5:0:0>Ki... <sp:5:0:0>Kil...<sp:5:0:0> Kil-something-or-other
bought the house.

What is he planning on doing here,
I wonder?
Talk_0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Now, what did I have for dinner again?
Or...perhaps I haven't had dinner yet?
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The inn?<sp:5:0:0> Hmm. <sp:5:0:0>Now, where did we decide
to meet?
Talk_0038:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>Whew, it's sure hard to stay up
late nowadays.
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, yes, Kil-something-or-other bought
this place.

By the way, dear, would you remind me
where we decided to meet?
Talk_0039:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:SurpriseS>Eh? <sp:5:0:0>Who are you, again? I'm sure I
recognize you from somewhere.

I just can't keep things straight,
these days...
Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:SurpriseS>What in Hyrule is this place? Is this really
Tarrey Town? <sp:5:1:0>Is it, dear?
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It may be late, but I'm wide-awake.


I decided to take a little stroll until it's
time to meet my wife.

Now then... <sp:5:0:0>Where did we decide to
meet? That's important...
Talk_0014:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>A monster! Look out! A monster!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0>Is anyone else here? Am I alone?!


<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice>Eh?<sp:5:0:0> Oh, this won't do.<sp:5:0:0> This is a mere
imitation. Hmph.
Talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It may be late, but I'm wide-awake.


I decided to take a little stroll until it's
time to meet my wife.

Now then... <sp:5:0:0>Where did we decide to
meet? That's important...
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkDeny>Was this where we planned to meet?
I'm sure it was outside...
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What's this? <sp:5:0:0>Where did my house go?<sp:5:0:0>
Did it run off somewhere?
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Eh? <sp:5:0:0>Oh, this won't do!<sp:5:0:0>


K... <sp:5:0:0>Ki... <sp:5:0:0>Kil...<sp:5:0:0> Kil-what's-his-name bought
this place.

But what IS this? Is this really
Tarrey Town?
Talk_0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Well, that's nothing for you to worry
about. It certainly doesn't worry me!
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkDeny>Eh? What's this?! <sp:5:0:0>My house is gone,<sp:5:0:0>
and instead there's...this?
Talk_0053:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sigh>It's late, isn't it? I should try and sleep.<sp:5:1:0>
Oh, yes...

Have we...<sp:5:0:0>met before?
